page.title: 05MEETHILL PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: Meethill School is 11 years old,so it is very modern.It makes use of many modern pieces of equipment i.e. 2 computers,cassette_recorder,a tape loop system,over_head projectors, a coloured television,a video recorder,a photo copier,etc.In the open_plan building,there are 2 large areas(junior and senior)and a separate nursery building.Also there is a library,an audio_visual room,3 offices,a staffroom and a kitchen.There are 311 pupils at the moment,aged between 5 and 12 years of age.Staff include 12 full_time teachers,Headmaster,a few visiting specialists teachers,2 secretaries,janitor,cleaners and kitchen staff.
